webDev.description: Fast, secure sites that work on every device and every browser.
webDev.longDescription: From one-page sites to complex business tools. We write every line of code by hand, test it thoroughly, and make sure it works perfectly for your users.

automation.description: Stop doing the same task twice. Let computers handle the boring work.
automation.longDescription: We build scripts that save you hours each week. Data collection, file processing, report generation - if it's repetitive, we can automate it.

seo.description: Get found when people search for what you do.

consulting.longDescription: Skip the tech jargon. We'll help you choose tools that solve your actual problems and won't break when your business grows.

maintenance.title: Ongoing Support
maintenance.description: We stick around. Your site stays fast, secure, and up-to-date.
maintenance.longDescription: Launch is just the beginning. We handle updates, fix issues, and make changes when you need them. No monthly contracts required.

nanobid.title: NanoBid - Auction Platform
nanobid.subtitle: Complete auction system
nanobid.description: A custom auction platform built from scratch in PHP for a local auction house.
nanobid.summaryText: Built a complete auction system from the ground up. Handles timed auctions, bidding, payments, and user management. Runs on a custom PHP framework we built specifically for this project.
nanobid.challengeText: The auction house needed their own system instead of paying expensive third-party fees. They needed something reliable that could handle real money transactions.
nanobid.solutionText: Built a secure auction platform with custom PHP, MySQL database, and Bootstrap frontend. Includes anti-sniping features, automatic bid increments, and secure payment processing.
nanobid.seoTitle: Case Study: NanoBid - Auction Platform | Web Development Warsaw
nanobid.seoDescription: See how we built the NanoBid auction platform from scratch. A case study in web application development in Warsaw by TITANCODE.
nanobid.seoKeywords: case study, auction platform, php, mysql, web applications warsaw, titancode portfolio

careerflex.title: CareerFlex — AI Job Search Assistant
careerflex.subtitle: Simple SaaS-style site
careerflex.description: A complex SaaS-style page that helps candidates automatically search and analyze jobs with AI.
careerflex.summaryText: We created a clean, no-nonsense product page and app that lets candidates automatically find and analyze job offers using AI. It saves time and gives clear guidance on which offers are a good match.
careerflex.challengeText: Job hunting is slow and repetitive. People read lots of similar descriptions and struggle to compare offers fairly.
careerflex.solutionText: We built a complex, focused experience where users upload their CV once, set basic preferences, and let the system search and analyze job offers automatically — then get straightforward recommendations.
careerflex.seoTitle: Case Study: CareerFlex — AI Job Search Assistant | TITANCODE
careerflex.seoDescription: CareerFlex is a complex SaaS-like page that helps candidates automatically search and analyze jobs with AI. Read the story.
careerflex.seoKeywords: careerflex, ai job search, portfolio, titancode

kurs8klasisty.subtitle: E-learning platform
kurs8klasisty.description: A complete website and course platform for an English tutor.
kurs8klasisty.summaryText: Built a complete website for an English tutor including course pages, blog, and admin system. Students can access course materials and track their progress.
kurs8klasisty.challengeText: Needed a professional website that could handle course content, student management, and look great on mobile devices.
kurs8klasisty.solutionText: Created a custom PHP backend with MySQL database and responsive frontend. Includes content management system, student tracking, and mobile-optimized design.

options.hasDesign_description: Save money if you provide a complete design file (Figma, Sketch, or even designs on paper), so that we can precisely create the design you imagine.
options.contentSeoPack_description: This option enables blog functionality, and simple admin panel to manage articles. It also includes setting Google Search Console, and detailed keyword research for your website, to receive organic traffic from Google.
options.advancedFeaturesPack_description: This can be anything from a functionality in admin panel, or something needs to be automated, to a custom integration with external service. If you have any specific requirements, please let us know.
options.logoDesign_description: A unique, professional logo to represent your brand identity. Also includes favicon (small icon in browser tab).
options.constantSupport_description: This is great option, if you are not a technical person, and you want to have peace of mind that your website is always up-to-date and secure. Note: We guarantee 30 days of free support after launch,so this option is included for the next month.
options.customOption_description: If you have any specific requirements that are not covered by the options above, please let us know. We can customize the package to fit your needs.

hero.title: We Build Websites That Actually Work
hero.subtitle: Your website should be your hardest working employee. We make sure it is.
hero.seoDescription: Meet TITANCODE. We specialize in building custom websites and web apps. See our process and the technologies we use.
hero.seoKeywords: about us, web development agency warsaw, custom web development, development team, titancode philosophy

mission.title: Why Custom Development?
mission.text: Most websites are built from templates and look like everyone else's. We started TITANCODE because we believe your business deserves better. We write every line of code by hand, specifically for your needs. No shortcuts, no compromises. Just websites that work exactly how you need them to.

process.title: How We Work
process.step1_desc: We learn about your business and what you actually need.
process.step2_desc: We create a design that makes sense for your users.
process.step3_desc: We build it with clean code that won't break when you grow.
process.step4_desc: We test everything to make sure it works perfectly.
process.step5_desc: We handle the technical stuff so you can focus on your business.
process.step6_desc: We're here when you need changes or something breaks.

whyUs.title: Why Work With Us?
whyUs.feature1_desc: No templates. Every project is built specifically for you.
whyUs.feature2_desc: Clean code that won't break when your business grows.
whyUs.feature3_desc: Fast sites that your customers will actually use.
whyUs.feature4_desc: You talk directly to the people building your site.
whyUs.feature5_desc: We use proven technologies that won't become obsolete.
whyUs.feature6_desc: Need changes? Something broken? We're here to help.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Let's build something that actually works for your business.

comparison.title: WordPress vs. Custom Code: The Honest Truth
comparison.subtitle: A high-end WordPress site often costs the same as a custom-built one. Here’s a look at what your money *really* buys you.

performance.title: Speed Matters. A Lot.
performance.description: Slow websites lose customers. It's that simple. We build for instant loading, because every millisecond counts for your ranking and your revenue.
performance.whatYouGet: A site that feels fast, keeps visitors engaged, and ranks higher on Google.

security.title: Don't Be an Easy Target.
security.description: WordPress is a hacker's favorite playground, with plugins being the most common weak spot. A custom site has no public blueprint for attackers to follow.
security.whatYouGet: Real peace of mind. Your business data and customer trust are properly protected.

cost.title: Same Price, Different Value.
cost.description: When you add up the costs of premium themes, plugins, and constant maintenance, WordPress isn't the budget option it seems. The initial price is often the same.
cost.whatYouGet: A faster, safer, one-of-a-kind website that's an actual asset, not a liability.

techStack.title: The Tools of the Trade
techStack.subtitle: We use modern, production-grade technology. Here's what that means for you.
techStack.nextjs_desc: The gold standard for building fast, user-focused web applications.
techStack.nextjs_benefit: Your site is fast, secure, and loved by Google.
techStack.react_desc: The engine for building dynamic, engaging user interfaces.
techStack.react_benefit: A modern, seamless experience for your customers.
techStack.typescript_desc: Catches errors before they happen, ensuring rock-solid reliability.
techStack.typescript_benefit: Your application is more stable and less prone to bugs.
techStack.php_desc: The backbone of the web, used for reliable and secure server logic.
techStack.php_benefit: A cost-effective and battle-tested foundation for your backend.
techStack.tailwind_desc: Allows for rapid, pixel-perfect design implementation.
techStack.tailwind_benefit: A beautiful, consistent design that we can update quickly.

priceInclude.question: What's included in the price?
priceInclude.answer: Everything you need to get online: design, development, testing, hosting, domain, and SSL certificate for the first year. No hidden fees.

beginnerStart.question: I'm new to this. How do I start?
beginnerStart.answer: Just fill out our contact form. We'll explain everything in plain English - domains, hosting, costs. We've helped many people with no technical experience get online.

hostingIncluded.question: Is hosting included?
hostingIncluded.answer: Yes. Hosting is included for the first year. After that, it's typically 300-500 PLN per year depending on your needs.

renewalFees.question: Are there renewal fees?
renewalFees.answer: Yes, after the first year you'll pay for hosting and domain renewal. Usually 300-500 PLN annually.

quality.question: Will my website be good quality?
quality.answer: Yes. All our sites are optimized for speed and work well on all devices. We test everything thoroughly before launch.

ssl.question: Do I get an SSL certificate?
ssl.answer: Yes, all websites include SSL certificates for security. Your site will show as secure in browsers.

cms.question: Do you use WordPress?
cms.answer: No. We build everything from scratch. This gives you exactly what you need without the bloat and security issues that come with WordPress.

customization.question: Can I customize the packages?
customization.answer: Yes. Every package can be adjusted to fit your specific needs. Contact us to discuss your requirements.

seo.title: Website Development Warsaw | Fast websites, SEO & performance
seo.description: We build fast, modern websites for Warsaw-based businesses. Next.js, strong Core Web Vitals, technical SEO, built to convert and generate leads.

landingWarsaw.h1: Websites in Warsaw that actually convert
landingWarsaw.lead: We build fast websites without WordPress limitations: clean technical SEO, strong Core Web Vitals, reliable analytics, real outcomes.

cards.title: Performance (CWV)
cards.desc: Built for speed: LCP, CLS and INP matter. This impacts SEO and conversions.

cards.title: Technical SEO
cards.desc: Canonicals, hreflang, sitemap, robots, correct headings and structure. No indexation traps.

cards.title: Conversion
cards.desc: Clear offer, CTAs, proof sections and case studies. The site should bring inquiries, not just look nice.

section2.title: What you get
bullets: Custom design + implementation in Next.js (or another stack if it makes sense)
PL/EN setup with correct hreflang and self-referencing canonicals
Analytics + conversion events (GA4, GTM) and baseline conversion tracking

finalCta.title: Want a quote?
finalCta.desc: Use the quick estimator and get a range + suggested scope.

seo.title: Landing page for an online course | Lead-gen, payments & automation
seo.description: We build course sales pages designed to convert: fast, SEO-ready, with analytics, payments integration and automation. No WordPress plugin chaos.

landingCourse.h1: A course landing page that closes sales
landingCourse.lead: Let’s build a sales page that loads instantly, tracks conversions, and scales your campaigns without technical debt.

section1.title: Why it works
section1.desc: We focus on clarity, credibility and measurable events—so you know what to improve and campaigns get cheaper over time.

cards.title: Speed + UX
cards.desc: Campaign performance depends on UX. A fast landing improves conversion and traffic quality.

cards.title: Integrations
cards.desc: Payments, newsletter, CRM, email automation and webhooks—built around your workflow.

section2.title: What I can implement
bullets: Sections: promise, proof, curriculum, bonuses, FAQ, CTA
Payments integration (Stripe / local providers depending on needs)

finalCta.title: Want to price it?
finalCta.desc: Share the scope and see a range + a recommended tier.

seo.title: Custom admin panel | Web apps, dashboards & integrations
seo.description: We build custom admin panels and web apps tailored to your processes: dashboards, roles, integrations, automation. Fast delivery without wasted budget.

landingAdminPanel.h1: A custom admin panel—built for your workflow
landingAdminPanel.lead: If spreadsheets and plugins aren’t enough anymore, it’s time for a proper system: roles, logs, integrations and dashboards designed around your process.

section1.title: When it’s worth it
section1.desc: When you need control, automation and a single source of truth—instead of tools that don’t connect.

cards.title: Roles & permissions
cards.desc: Per-role access, audit logs, traceability and security.

cards.title: Integrations
cards.desc: APIs, webhooks, payments, CRM, invoicing, inventory—built for the real workflow.

cards.title: Dashboards
cards.desc: KPI visualizations, alerts, reporting—so decisions are data-driven.

finalCta.title: Have a process to automate?
finalCta.desc: Describe it in 2–3 sentences. We’ll tell you the approach and a realistic cost range.
